hints.content:
The total number of observations is the total of heights of all the bars in the histogram.

$\begin{align}\text{Number of observations}&=12+6+5+3+3+1\\
\\&=30\end{align}$

* There are $30$ observations in the histogram.
*  The temperatures were measured in degrees Fahrenheit.

question.content:
The histogram shows daily minimum temperatures that were recorded over a month in a city in California:  

**Complete the following sentences.**

There are [[☃ input-number 1]] observations in the histogram.

The temperatures were measured in [[☃ dropdown 2]].



![](https://ka-perseus-images.s3.amazonaws.com/fee0dad91a6f542fc6a368f0ee6c723edd364499.png)
